message_en: New update available: New Aggressive Road Rage Driver callout!
changelog_en:
NEW:
\
- Added new dynamic Aggressive Road Rage Driver callout.
\
- Suspect initially blends into normal traffic and escalates only after player detection.
\
- Road rage can be triggered by proximity, sirens, or police presence.
\
- Optional victim vehicle enables realistic road rage scenarios in live traffic.
\
- Dynamic escalation paths including confrontation, vehicle pursuit, foot pursuit, or armed resistance.
\
- Extremely high replay value due to unpredictable and randomized outcomes.
\
- Versioning system updated to Major.Minor.Patch format.
\

\

\
- Integrated stress-based suspect behavior with increasing aggression.
\
- Suspect reactions depend on player distance, siren usage, movement, and weapon status.
\
- Added realistic road rage driving maneuvers (brake checking, cutting off vehicles, side-swiping).
\
- Smooth transition from calm driving to aggressive and hostile behavior.
\
- Route blip dynamically switches from vehicle tracking to on-foot suspect tracking.
\

\
FIXES:
\
- Improved stability during vehicle stops and pursuits.
\
- Fixed edge cases when the suspect exits or re-enters vehicles.
\
- General cleanup and safety fixes when ending the callout.
